headline: How Investors May Respond To Ameren (AEE) Lifting Its Dividend For A 13th Straight Year
summary: Ameren Corporation recently declared a higher quarterly cash dividend of US$0.75 per share, up from US$0.71, implying an annualized rate of US$3.00 per share payable on March 31, 2026, to shareholders of record on March 10, 2026. This thirteenth consecutive annual dividend increase underlines the board’s confidence in Ameren’s regulated utility model, ongoing infrastructure investment program, and earnings power supported by long-term industrial load contracts. With this latest dividend...
